src:
Dačić: Zašto bih sam sebe skidao sa vlasti, nisam glup

04 Nov 2019, 13:10

Šef srpske diplomatije Ivica Dačić izjavio je danas da se saradnja Socijalističke partije Srbije (SPS) i Srpske napredne stranke (SNS) zasniva na saglasnosti oko kljulčnih političkih ciljeva a da je sve drugo stvar medjustranačkih odnosa i odbacio navode da je u kontaktu sa liderom PSG Sergejem Trifunovićem. "Nikada ne smemo dozvoliti da to (medjustranački odnosi) narušava ono što radimo u interesu države. Mislim da nije dobro što su napadi na mene počeli u toku sednice Saveta bezbednosti UN,  dok sam govorio o Kosovu i svadjao se sa (ambasadorkom Kosova u SAD) Vljorom Čitaku", rekao je Dačić na pitanje o odnosima unutar vladajuće koalicije o čemu će biti reči i na današnjem Predsedništvu SNS.Dačič je odbacio navode medija da je u kontaktu sa liderom PSG Sergejem Trifunovićem sa kojim navodno pregovara o formiranju vlasti. "Zašto bih ja zvao jednog Sergeja Trifunovića i nešto mu govorio ili da dilujem sa nekim da bih sam sebe skinuo sa vlasti. Ja ću sam sebe da skinem sa vlasti da bih se udružio sa Djilasom koji nikad neće doći na vlast. Pa nisam baš toliko glup. Nemojte da mislite to", rekao je DačićDačić je rekao da "svaka stranka, kao što je rekao i predsednik Srbije Aleksnadar Vučić ima svoju politiku i želi da se obraća svojim biračima i stabilizuje svoje briačko telo da jasno predstavi za koga treba da se glasa, ali da to ne treba i neće da ugrožava nacionalne interese".
text:
Dacic: Why should I remove myself from power, I'm not stupid

04 Nov 2019, 12:10

Serbian Foreign Minister Ivica Dacic said today that the co-operation between the Socialist Party of Serbia (SPS) and the Serbian Progressive Party (SNS) is based on agreement on key political goals and that everything else is a matter of inter-party relations, and rejected allegations that he is in contact with PSG leader Sergei Trifunovic. "We must never allow it (inter-party relations) to disrupt what we are doing in the interest of the state. I think it is not good that the attacks on me began during the UN Security Council session while I was talking about Kosovo and arguing with (the ambassador of Kosovo to the US ) To Vlach Chitak, "Dacic said when asked about relations within the ruling coalition, which will also be discussed at today's SNS Presidency. Dacic has denied media allegations that he is in contact with PSG leader Sergei Trifunovic, with whom he is allegedly negotiating to form power. "Why would I call one Sergei Trifunovic and say something to him or deal with someone to get himself out of power? I will take myself out of power to partner with Djilas who will never come to power. don't think so, "Dacic saidDacic said that" every party, as Serbian President Aleksander Vucic said, has a policy of his own and wants to address his constituents and stabilize his electorate to clearly represent who he should stand for but that this should not and will not endanger national interests. "
